room.name: A Starting Place
room.description: This is the starting room. It is completely empty.

room.name: North of a Starting Place
room.description: Well, you've moved to a room north of the starting room... but it's still completely empty.

room.name: Northeast of A Starting Place
room.description: Woohoo! Just kidding... this room is still completely empty.

room.name: East of A Starting Place
room.description: Nothing here. Move along, move along.
